name: Intergalactic Inhabitance Mission
description:
Thanks to light speed technology, 3D-printable domes and baby designers, we can start taking the universe by storm. We are able to inhabit every planet we see. It is up to you, Pilot, to visit as many planets as possible. Beware though, since black holes are everywhere and will try to consume you. Good luck!

W / Up arrow key - Accelerate

A D / Left and Right arrow keys - Turn left/right

E - Inhabit planet

Space - Show the nearest black hole

Esc - Pause game

This game was made for the 42nd Ludum Dare with the theme "Running out of Space" using GameMaker Studio 2.

I recommend downloading "iim-game-2.zip", the post-jam version where a lot of bugs were fixed.
